typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		submission_date as string,
		state as string,
		tot_cases as string,
		conf_cases as string,
		prob_cases as string,
		new_case as string,
		pnew_case as string,
		tot_death as string,
		conf_death as string,
		prob_death as string,
		new_death as string,
		pnew_death as string,
		created_at as string,
		consent_cases as string,
		consent_deaths as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcRawCoviDataAsql
source(output(
		DateKey as integer,
		Date as date,
		DayDate as integer,
		DayOfWeekName as string,
		WeekNumber as integer,
		MonthNumber as integer,
		MonthName as string,
		MonthShortName as string,
		Year as integer,
		QuarterNumber as string,
		QuarterName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM DimCalendar WHERE [Date] >= (SELECT ISNULL(MIN(submission_date),\'2020-01-01\') FROM RawCovidData) \nAND [Date] <= (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(submission_date),\'2020-12-31\') FROM RawCovidData)',
	format: 'query') ~> SrcDimDate
source(output(
		StateKey as integer,
		StateCode as string,
		StateName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcDimState
source(output(
		CovidDataKey as integer,
		DateKey as integer,
		StateKey as integer,
		ConformedNewCases as integer,
		ProbableNewCases as integer,
		ConformedNewDeath as integer,
		ProbableNewDeath as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcFactCovidData
SrcRawCoviDataAsql derive(DateId = toDate(submission_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy'),
		ConformedNewCases = toInteger(new_case) - toInteger(pnew_case),
		ConformedNewDeath = toInteger(new_death) - toInteger(pnew_death),
		ProbableNewCases = toInteger(pnew_case),
		ProbableNewDeath = toInteger(pnew_death)) ~> DerConformedCasesAndDeath
DerConformedCasesAndDeath select(mapColumn(
		DateId,
		StateCode = state,
		ConformedNewCases,
		ProbableNewCases,
		ConformedNewDeath,
		ProbableNewDeath
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelStgColumns
Join1, SelStgColumns join(Date == DateId
	&& SrcDimState@StateCode == SelStgColumns@StateCode,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimCalendar
DerReplaceNullWithDefault select(mapColumn(
		DateKey,
		StateKey,
		ConformedNewCases = DerConformedNewCases,
		ProbableNewCases = DerProbableNewCases,
		ConformedNewDeath = DerConformedNewDeath,
		ProbableNewDeath = DerProbableNewDeath
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelRequiredColumns
JoinDimCalendar derive(DerConformedNewCases = iifNull(ConformedNewCases, 0),
		DerProbableNewCases = iifNull(ProbableNewCases, 0),
		DerConformedNewDeath = iifNull(ConformedNewDeath, 0),
		DerProbableNewDeath = iifNull(ProbableNewDeath, 0)) ~> DerReplaceNullWithDefault
SrcDimDate, SrcDimState join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
SelRequiredColumns, SrcFactCovidData lookup(SelRequiredColumns@DateKey == SrcFactCovidData@DateKey
	&& SelRequiredColumns@StateKey == SrcFactCovidData@StateKey,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpFactCovid
SelNewAndLkpCol alterRow(insertIf(or(isNull(lkp_DateKey),isNull(lkp_StateKey))),
	updateIf((!isNull(lkp_DateKey)&&!isNull(lkp_StateKey))&&((ConformedNewCases!=lkp_ConformedNewCases)||(ConformedNewDeath!=lkp_ConformedNewDeath)||(ProbableNewCases!=lkp_ProbableNewCases)||(ProbableNewDeath!=lkp_ProbableNewDeath)))) ~> AltDefInsertUpdateCondition
LkpFactCovid select(mapColumn(
		DateKey = SelRequiredColumns@DateKey,
		StateKey = SelRequiredColumns@StateKey,
		ConformedNewCases = SelRequiredColumns@ConformedNewCases,
		ProbableNewCases = SelRequiredColumns@ProbableNewCases,
		ConformedNewDeath = SelRequiredColumns@ConformedNewDeath,
		ProbableNewDeath = SelRequiredColumns@ProbableNewDeath,
		lkp_DateKey = SrcFactCovidData@DateKey,
		lkp_StateKey = SrcFactCovidData@StateKey,
		lkp_ConformedNewCases = SrcFactCovidData@ConformedNewCases,
		lkp_ProbableNewCases = SrcFactCovidData@ProbableNewCases,
		lkp_ConformedNewDeath = SrcFactCovidData@ConformedNewDeath,
		lkp_ProbableNewDeath = SrcFactCovidData@ProbableNewDeath
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelNewAndLkpCol
AltDefInsertUpdateCondition sink(input(
		CovidDataKey as integer,
		DateKey as integer,
		StateKey as integer,
		ConformedNewCases as integer,
		ProbableNewCases as integer,
		ConformedNewDeath as integer,
		ProbableNewDeath as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['DateKey','StateKey'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		DateKey,
		StateKey,
		ConformedNewCases,
		ProbableNewCases,
		ConformedNewDeath,
		ProbableNewDeath
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SnkLoadFactCovidDate
